translation.en: Oh, my God. Where is it?
[in Japanese] Yamada-san, do you have the newspaper?
BODY PART FOUND IN TOKYO BAY

-Anything else? -What are you busting my ass for?

我们有几个问题要问你

我是笹川事务所的翻译

translation.zh: 告诉我莉莉布里杰斯失踪那晚发生了什么

translation.zh: 据我们所知 你是最后跟她说话的人

translation.zh: 所以那不是你最后一次见她？

translation.en: -I didn't catch up with her. -Why did you follow her?
translation.zh: 我没追上她 你为什么要跟着她？

translation.en: She had something of mine. I wanted it back.
translation.zh: 她拿了我的东西 我想要回来

translation.en: So you spoke to her again?
No. I said I didn't find her.
translation.zh: 没有 我说了我没找到她

translation.zh: 你以为她当时要往车站去？

translation.en: -Is that strange? -And you never saw her again?
translation.zh: -很奇怪吗？-然后你再也没有见过她吗？

translation.en: How many times do I need to answer the same question?
translation.zh: 我还要回答同样的问题多少次？

translation.en: tell me, how long have you been in Japan?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你来日本多久了？
你不应该问问我是否同意吗？

translation.en: What do you take pictures of then?
But everyone calls me Lucy Fly.
translation.zh: 但大家都叫我露西弗莱

translation.en: What kind of camera is that?

translation.zh: 用的是瑞光50毫米的镜头

translation.en: Because that's what normal people do.

translation.en: -But you are not normal. -Neither are you.
So let's not pretend to be.
Let's just be honest with each other from the beginning.

translation.en: All day long, I watch people talk,
translation.zh: 我每天从早到晚都在观察人们对话

translation.zh: 他们什么都说就是不说自己的真实想法

translation.en: Well, the noodles are too hot, and the broth is too salty.
translation.zh: 面条太烫了 汤太咸了

translation.en: This is the strangest date I've ever been on, if it's even a date.
translation.zh: 这次约会是我去过的最奇怪的一个了要是你管它叫约会的话

translation.en: I probably shouldn't trust a stranger that I've just met,
translation.zh: 我可能不该相信一个自己刚刚遇到的陌生人

translation.en: Now, you be honest with me.
You've already done that. What else?
translation.zh: 你已经拍了 还有什么？

translation.en: Yes. Not many people have been here.
translation.zh: 是的 没几个人来过这里

translation.en: Where do you want me to stand?
What do you want me to do?
I've never had my picture taken before.

只有在地震之后才听得见

[woman in Japanese] A friend of mine is organizing a special event

translation.zh: 露西弗莱 最近怎么样？

translation.en: Come and meet the new recruit.

translation.zh: 她在这似乎没法好好表现

translation.zh: 她感觉自己降落在月球上了

translation.zh: 所以要是你能帮上她点什么就太好了

-谢谢 夏子-今天是你生日吗？

-我要喝札幌 谢谢-哦 我也要

Yeah, I really need to find somewhere.
translation.zh: 是 我真的得找地方住我一直在为这件事焦虑

But I'm working at a bar right now,
and my dad sent me money, so I can afford my own place.
translation.zh: 我爸一直在给我打钱好租得起房子

We don't have anything in common.
I don't wanna get stuck looking after her.
Oh, you won't. It's just... Look, she's new, so I--

translation.zh: 好吧 抱歉我说大话了
好吧 随你怎么说吧

translation.zh: 所以你跟那个男的怎么样了？

translation.zh: 他长了张豆酱脸还是番茄酱脸？

translation.zh: 我们用这种方式来说一个日本人
长得更东方还是更西方？

translation.en: -In the bedroom? -We haven't done anything yet.
-Taking it slow? -It's not up to me.
translation.zh: -要慢慢来吗？-这事不取决于我

是给未婚女性穿的 对吧？
是给年轻单身女性穿的

Because of my job. You know, I'm a magistrate.
translation.zh: 因为我的工作性质 我是个地方法官

translation.zh: 大部分男人觉得太可怕了

Not in the eyes of Japanese men.
Maybe I could get a widower.
[laughs] Or an old one with medical problems.
translation.zh: 或者找一个生病的老男人

translation.en: But I don’t know how I'd find the time.
I have my job, my friends,

She fell down the stairs when I greeted her.
translation.zh: 我招呼她进来的时候摔下楼梯了

translation.zh: 死亡与我如影随形 总是这样

You will tell me, in time.
And I will tell you things about me.
The first time we saw each other,
I knew we could be truthful.

translation.zh: 这是我姑姑 是她抚育我成人的

Why didn't you say that when I asked before?

translation.en: so in case of an earthquake...

[in English] Will you order me a coffee?
[in English] You have to be able to order for yourself.
How are you gonna survive if you can't ask for anything?

translation.en: [in English] That's crazy that she understood that.
translation.zh: 她居然听得懂 太疯狂了

translation.en: The light, the shadow, everything exactly right.
translation.zh: 光 影 一切都刚刚好

translation.zh: 摄影俱乐部有十来个人

translation.zh: 但是他们最后都离开了 只剩我了

translation.en: [in English] I read once that when...
the Westerners arrived in 19th century Japan,
they wanted to photograph the locals, but...

被拍对象总会把一些东西

translation.zh: -你会见到他的-你们相处的还好吗？

translation.zh: 哦 我们乐队下周还有表演

translation.zh: 是啊 这些音乐家是我合作过的最棒的

[Bob] Oh, my goodness. Look at that.

没骨折 应该就是扭伤

translation.en: [grunts] I fell on this, and Lily's playing nurse.
translation.zh: 我摔倒了 莉莉在演护士

translation.en: I'm not playing. I used to work at George Washington Hospital.
translation.zh: 我没演我之前在乔治华盛顿医院工作

和倒影 他会到处拍照的

I wish I could meet him.

translation.en: -I don't know. -Come on, it'll be fun.
translation.zh: -不知道-来嘛 会很好玩的

translation.en: I mean, not the ones of me, of course, but...
translation.zh: 当然我不是说有我的那些

translation.en: the ones of the city. They're really good.

translation.en: -why are you taking them? -I'm collecting them.

translation.zh: 或者出版 让大家都看见

[in Japanese] I've got to go to work.
[in Japanese] Will I see you this weekend?

translation.zh: -我知道 但是...-我会打电话的

translation.en: Yes. I must get back to work.
translation.zh: 是 我要回去工作了
我不知道 她离开了

translation.en: [in Japanese] We finished. She left. I didn’t try to find her.
translation.zh: 我们结束了 她离开了我没试着找她

translation.zh: 我遇见你之后就不再想她了

translation.zh: 抱歉 求你忘记我做过这件事
我得回去工作了 抱抱我

It's just that I think about you all the time, every moment.

translation.zh: -我想多了解你一点-你不能这么了解

translation.zh: 我妈妈给我写了封信八天才收到

translation.zh: 我给我闺蜜打了个电话我们聊了20分钟

I find it better not to call.
It's getting late. I think Lily wants to go home.
translation.zh: 已经很晚了 我想莉莉想回家了

translation.en: Are you kidding? I'd love to.
Oh, my God. He's so cute!
He's not cute. Kittens are cute.
translation.zh: 他才不可爱 小猫才可爱

translation.zh: 随便吧 他太帅了 而且他很高

translation.en: I thought Japanese guys were supposed to be short.
translation.zh: 我还以为日本男人都很矮

-Hey! -I don't wanna bother you if Teiji's here.
translation.zh: -嘿！-祯二在 我就不打扰了

translation.zh: -不过这里没有树-是啊 没树

translation.zh: 那天晚上能见到他真好

translation.zh: -怎么这么说？-因为我感觉得到 我了解男人

My personality is a combination of my genes,
translation.zh: 我的性格是由我的基因

translation.zh: 教养 父母 学校决定的跟星星无关

translation.zh: 对 但是我也看的出来

translation.zh: 有时候我在酒吧收钱的时候

translation.zh: 然后你在这条线上有三条断裂之处

translation.zh: 太复杂了 我看不出来

translation.zh: 这就像一扇打开的窗我能看到一些东西

translation.en: -I didn't mean to freak you out. -I'm not freaked out.
-I think it stopped. -Yeah, I think it did.

Won't you be going with Teiji?

I have to think about it, because Bob invited me to some concert that he's--
translation.zh: 我得想想因为鲍勃邀请我去音乐会...

translation.en: Thank you. I'll take care of it.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我会好好保护它的

translation.en: let's not take any more photos today.
-Okay. -No, I mean, we could take some more.
translation.zh: -好吧-不 我是说 我们可以多拍点

translation.en: Not when you don't want to.
Did you used to go out in Shinjuku with Sachi?
translation.zh: 你以前会跟莎姬一起去新宿吗？

translation.en: Natsuko, the girl I work with, she has a sister who's in a band,
translation.zh: 跟我一起工作的夏子有个妹妹是玩乐队的

translation.en: and they're gonna play at this club tomorrow night.
Well, we never go out. We could.
Bob is gonna be there, and... Lily, I think.
translation.zh: 鲍勃也会在 莉莉...也在

translation.en: I don't get it. They're not really my thing.
translation.zh: 我欣赏不来 不喜欢这款

translation.en: I mean, they have an image.
translation.zh: 我是说他们有组合形象

translation.en: Apparently, they just signed a record contract.
So, are you and Lily dating now?
translation.zh: 所以你现在在跟莉莉交往吗？

translation.en: Nope. She's a piece of work, that one.
She sends all these signals, but she doesn't follow through.
translation.zh: 她四处发信号 但是不接招

translation.en: All right, so... we got off together.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们睡过一次

translation.en: And fair enough, it was just once,
but then we made a plan to go to this music festival in Nagoya this weekend.
translation.zh: 然后我们计划这周一起去名古屋的音乐节

translation.en: And she just called and canceled and didn't give me any reason.
translation.zh: 结果她突然打来电话取消了没说任何理由

translation.en: When she's interested in you, you're the only one who exists.
translation.zh: 所以她对你感兴趣的时候你就是全世界唯一的活物

translation.en: Then she moves on to someone else, and it's like you were never even there.
translation.zh: 等她看上别人了你就像没存在过一样

translation.en: -Do you want a beer? -[Bob] I'll get one, mate.
translation.zh: -想来瓶啤酒吗？-给我来一瓶吧 兄弟
冰 冰 冰 冰

translation.en: -[in Japanese] Did you have fun tonight? -Yeah.
Well, you and Lily were having a good time out there.
Yes. She is a good dancer.
translation.zh: 是啊 她舞跳得很好
没有 完全不 怎么了？

translation.en: You are my girlfriend, after all.
translation.zh: 不管怎么说 你是我女朋友

translation.en: [Lucy] How many girlfriends did you have before Sachi?
translation.zh: 莎姬之前你谈过几个女朋友？

translation.en: You were too busy in the school darkroom?
translation.zh: 因为你一直在学校的暗房里忙吗？

translation.en: When did you lose your virginity?
[in Japanese] I didn’t really like the girls in my hometown.
translation.zh: 我不是很喜欢我家乡那边的女孩

translation.en: [in English] How about you? Your first time?
I went over to see my friend at her house, but...
translation.zh: 我去我朋友家找她 但是...

translation.en: Her dad told me that he had his own
translation.zh: 她爸爸告诉我他有自己的

translation.en: vodka distillery in the garden shed, so we went and...
translation.zh: 伏特蒸馏室 就在花园里所以我们就去了

translation.en: too happy, of course, when I told him.
translation.zh: 我告诉他的时候 他很不开心

translation.en: And my friend didn't show up to school.
It turns out that he had gone off to sea in a canoe and went too far out.
translation.zh: 原来是他乘小舟出海 结果漂得太远

translation.en: The current was too strong, they said.
He washed up a few kilometers down the shore.
translation.zh: 在几千米下的海岸上找到了他

translation.en: And I found out that the baby...
Do you still think about him?
[Ms. Katoh in Japanese] It's an old book, but has a lot about the culture of Sado.
translation.zh: 这是本老书 但记录了很多有关佐渡的文化

translation.en: but not so many people go there anymore.
translation.zh: 但是大家都不怎么去了

translation.en: -I have some cream you can use. -No. I'm good.
I haven't seen him since Tuesday when we went to the club.
translation.zh: 自周二那天我们去酒吧之后我就没再见过他了

translation.en: No. He's just been very busy lately,
translation.zh: 没有 他就是最近太忙了

translation.en: and I've been working on those translations for electrical--
translation.zh: 我又一直在忙翻译的事 -翻译电...-他来了

translation.en: -[in Japanese] I never thought you'd come. -Why not?
translation.zh: -我还以为你不来了-为什么不来？

translation.en: -Well, it's good to see you. -You too.
It's probably very cold and full of sea urchins and...
translation.zh: 估计很冷又满是海胆 而且...
所以呢？ 来吧 露西

translation.en: [Teiji] So, Lily, you're a nurse in America.
translation.zh: 所以莉莉 你在美国做护士

translation.en: I mean, I do miss the hospital, and the bar is really hard.
translation.zh: 我的确很想念医院酒吧工作很艰难

translation.en: [Teiji] I think it's a good kind of work, like the noodle shop.
translation.zh: 我感觉这是份好工作就像经营面店

translation.en: It gives me all the time I need for thinking.
Because my body just gets on with the job by itself.
translation.zh: 因为我身体会自动做那些事

translation.en: Yeah. I'm really bad at bartending, though.
translation.zh: 是啊 我真的不擅长做酒保

translation.en: Sometimes I think the customers are gonna start jumping over the counter
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得那些顾客都想跳进吧台

translation.en: At least now you're not around death every day.
translation.zh: 至少你不是每天都被死亡包围

translation.en: I mean, that's part of the job.
translation.zh: 我是说 那是工作的一部分

translation.en: Well, I'd say that there were three times that I saved somebody's life,
translation.zh: 我至少救了别人的命三次

translation.en: so I like to think about that rather than...
translation.zh: 所以我更想去想这方面而不是想...

translation.en: I just really like the color. You don't mind, do you?
translation.zh: 我很喜欢这个颜色你不介意的对吧？

translation.en: Teiji can sleep here, and you can sleep here next to me.
translation.zh: 祯二可以睡在这 你可以睡在我旁边

translation.en: [Teiji] This is a traditional Japanese breakfast.
I think I’d prefer some traditional Japanese cornflakes.
translation.zh: 我觉得我更喜欢日本传统玉米片

translation.en: I heard about this, um, gold mine in Aikawa.
It could be fun to go visit.
Apparently, they have these animatronic mannequins
translation.zh: 他们有那种电子人体模型

translation.en: that kind of show how the miners used to work.
translation.zh: 展示过去的矿工如何作业

translation.en: I'd kind of rather see the coast and the cliffs at Senkaku.
translation.zh: 我更想去看尖阁诸岛的海岸和悬崖

translation.en: Well, how about we go and do both?
translation.zh: 那我们两个都去怎么样？

translation.en: We'll go to the cliffs in the morning,
and then we'll go and cool off in the gold mine in the afternoon.
translation.zh: 然后下午去金矿凉快凉快

translation.en: I can't believe you just did that.
Hold on, sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
translation.zh: 等等 坐下 坐下

translation.en: You're running a temperature. I'm going to lay you down, okay?
translation.zh: 你有点发烧 躺下好吗？

translation.en: I'm going to lay you down.
Just try and lay down. It's okay.
translation.zh: 试着躺下来 没事的

translation.en: You left me on a fucking cliff top.
translation.zh: 你把我留在他妈的悬崖上
-你看到我们留的字条了吗？-字条？

translation.en: Yeah. We left you a note under a rock, by the shirt, saying we were coming here,
translation.zh: 是啊 我们在衬衫旁边的石头下给你留了张字条 说我们来了这

translation.en: and if you didn't come here, we'd come back for you.
translation.zh: 你要是没来我们就过去找你

translation.en: No, I didn't see a note just lying around.
translation.zh: 没有 我完全没看到字条

translation.en: -Oh. Well, it must've blown away. -[Lucy scoffs] Right.
Yeah, maybe. Maybe we're all just gonna blow away off the edge of the world.
translation.zh: 是啊 也许我们都会被吹到世界尽头

translation.en: You might have a virus, or it could be that fish eye you had for breakfast.
translation.zh: 你身体里可能有病毒可能是因为你早上吃的鱼眼睛

translation.en: I've got pills at the hotel. Why don't we go back?
translation.zh: 我们回去的之后酒店里有药

translation.en: -I don't need your pills. -I'm just trying to help.
translation.zh: -我才不要你的药-我只是想帮忙

translation.en: -Lucy, you're not making any sense. -I know what I'm feeling.
translation.zh: -露西 你不可理喻了-我清楚自己的感受

translation.en: And what I'm feeling isn't right. It's not right at all.
translation.zh: 我感觉不对 完全不对

translation.en: It's like nature is taking it back.
translation.zh: 就好像自然收回了一切

translation.en: Tell me! How did you kill her?
translation.zh: 告诉我！ 你怎么杀她的？

translation.en: It is good you are talking now.
translation.zh: 你能说出来真是太好了

translation.en: Tell me why you did it.
translation.zh: 告诉我你为什么这么干

translation.en: It's best to give us as much information as possible.
translation.zh: 你能给我们提供越多信息越好

translation.en: All you need to know is
[in Japanese] Hi, this is Lucy Fly. I'm not in right now. Please leave a message.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是露西弗莱现在不在家 请给我留言

translation.en: [Lily in English] Lucy, are you there?
I need to talk to you.
-Are you sick? -I'm not feeling very well.
I'll be fine in a day or two.
Is there something you need to talk about?
Well, what should I tell them at work?
You can tell them anything. I'm quitting.
translation.zh: 说什么都行 我要辞职

translation.en: Lucy, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: 露西 你在说什么啊？

translation.en: I'm worried about you. Just leave me, Natsuko!
I know I fucked up and I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道我搞砸了我很抱歉

translation.en: I don't know. Kind of. It's kind of driving me crazy, you know?
translation.zh: 我不知道 有点？这让我觉得有点疯狂

translation.en: I invited you to Sado Island.
I was the one who introduced you in the first place.
translation.zh: 我是介绍你们认识的人

translation.en: I know you're angry, and this isn't an excuse,
translation.zh: 我知道你很生气 我不是在找借口

translation.en: but maybe there's a bigger reason for all of this that...
translation.zh: 但也许这一切都有更深层的原因

translation.en: -that we don't understand. -Well, did you see it in my palm?
translation.zh: -是我们无法理解的原因-那你在我掌纹里看见了吗？

translation.en: Did you dream it was meant to be?
translation.zh: 你梦到这是命中注定了吗？

translation.en: He was the only person who ever really saw who I was!
translation.zh: 他是唯一看到了我真实一面的人！
我很抱歉 露西 好吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry! But can I please come in?
I feel like something really bad is gonna happen.
translation.zh: 我预感很坏的事情就要发生了

translation.en: Looks like the girl in the bay was not your friend after all.
translation.zh: 似乎海湾里找到的尸体根本不是你朋友

translation.en: we do know it wasn't Lily Bridges.
translation.zh: 我们知道不是莉莉布里杰斯

translation.en: That puts your statement in serious doubt.
translation.zh: 所以你的说话就很值得怀疑
你杀了莉莉布里杰斯吗？

translation.en: Then why did you say you did?
translation.zh: 那你为什么说是自己干的？

translation.en: Because I wanted to kill her.
[Oguchi] You do realize the crime you confessed to
translation.zh: 你知道自己承认谋杀罪

translation.en: We have been unable to locate Mr. Matsuda.
Do you know where he is?
Do you think there’s a possibility that Lily and Matsuda may have
translation.zh: 你觉得有没有可能莉莉和松田先生

translation.en: At this point, we are reclassifying this as a missing persons case.
translation.zh: 现在我们将这起案子归为失踪人口案

translation.en: I think I may have preferred it when she was dead.
we all live in our own reality.
translation.zh: 我们都活在自己的现实中

translation.en: you thought you did kill Lily Bridges.
translation.zh: 你以为自己杀了莉莉布里杰斯

translation.en: You have guilt, but it is from a deeper source.
translation.zh: 你的愧疚来自更深层的地方

translation.en: Why did you come to Japan?
I would take a book and read.
my brothers showed up. They had been on a fishing trip with the Boy Scouts.
translation.zh: 我兄弟们来了他们跟童子军一块去钓鱼

translation.en: and started throwing pine cones and stones...
There was this sharp heavy stone on the ground.
I saw my brother... Marcus, he had his hands on it.
translation.zh: 我看见我哥哥马科斯把它捡了起来

translation.en: His head was pierced... by a long rusty nail sticking out from a plank of wood.
translation.zh: 他的头被木板上一根很长的生了锈的尖钉刺破了

translation.en: He tried to get up with the plank still attached to him.
translation.zh: 他试着站了起来但是木板还钉在他头上

translation.en: again, his eyes stared back at me.
The nurse said to me, "It's not your fault."
translation.zh: 护士对我说 “不是你的错”

translation.en: I didn't know what she meant.
I didn't speak for three years.
It's easy to ignore people when they are silent.
translation.zh: 人们在沉默的时候很容易被忽视

translation.en: So that's what my family did.
translation.zh: 所以我家人也是这么做的

translation.en: I knew what they were thinking about me.
At the age of 11, I started learning Japanese.
translation.zh: -怎么逃？-我11岁那年 开始学日语

translation.en: But it has nothing to do with this case.

translation.zh: 请在撤回申请书上签字

translation.en: I'm sorry. He's not in right now.
Do you want to leave a message?
He will be here tomorrow morning.
I've been waiting for you for two days.
I knew I had to come here, that you would understand.
translation.zh: 我知道我得来这里 但你会明白的

translation.en: I was at the police station.
We can go away from here, to the north.
translation.zh: 我们可以离开这里 到北方去

translation.en: Hokkaido. Or the south, to Kyushu.
translation.zh: 去北海道 或者往南 去九国

translation.en: [Ms. Katoh in English] Can I come in?
I just made some onigiri. Would you like some?
translation.zh: 我刚刚做了点饭团 你想来点吗？

translation.en: It was my mistake to move in here.
Don't say that. You've been so kind.
She asked me if she could come in.
It wasn't your fault. It was.
There were others, too. My brother...
translation.zh: 还有其他人 我哥哥…
我朋友的父亲 山本女士

translation.en: I can hardly walk up the stairs without seeing her face.
translation.zh: 每当我上楼都无法控制地看见她的脸

translation.en: I had waxed the steps two days before.
translation.zh: 事发两天前 我给台阶打了蜡

translation.en: I only do it once every two years.
I was worried they were a little slippery.
I talked to Yamamoto-san earlier that day.
translation.zh: 那天早些时候我和山本女士通过电话

translation.en: But... I only remembered once I'd hung up.
translation.zh: 但是… 挂了电话我才想起

translation.en: would you say it was my fault?
